config.title: Footer Style 09
config.layout_xml:
<body> <referenceBlock name="footer_links" remove="true" /> <referenceBlock name="copyright" remove="true" /> <referenceBlock name="report.bugs" remove="true" /> <referenceBlock name="form.subscribe" remove="true" /> <move element="theme-layout-footer" destination="footer-container" />
<block class="Magento\Store\Block\Switcher" name="footer-switch-language" template="Magento_Store::switch/languages-style-02.phtml" /> <block class="Magento\Directory\Block\Currency" name="footer-switch-currency" template="Magento_Directory::currency-style-02.phtml" /> </body>
config.content:
{{block name="footer-top" class="Magento\Framework\View\Element\Template" template="Magento_Theme::html/footer-top.phtml" child_blocks="footer-switch-language,footer-switch-currency"}}

About us

Looking cautiously round, to ascertain that they were not overheard, the two hags cowered nearer to the fire, and chuckled heartily.

Subscribe us

orders & returns

  • Return & Exchange Promise
